sentences.sContent: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.sCn: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.sContent: Have you ever been to Paris?
I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.sContent: If you’re ever in Seattle, come and see me.
sentences.sCn: 如果你什么时候到了西雅图，就来看我吧。

trans.tranOther: a word meaning at any time; used mostly in questions, negatives, comparisons, or sentences with ‘if’
